thread.title: live scores: Coverage of the first Test between Pakistan and England at Sheikh Zayed Stadium, Abu
thread.title_full: Pakistan v England first Test live scores: Coverage of the first Test between Pakistan and England at Sheikh Zayed Stadium, Abu | The Advertiser

title: live scores: Coverage of the first Test between Pakistan and England at Sheikh Zayed Stadium, Abu
text:
ENGLAND heads into the first looking to improve on its poor record against the United Arab Emirates-based side.
In 18 Tests against Pakistan on foreign soil, England has only won twice, losing seven times and drawing nine. This is a win/loss ratio of 0.29, which is England’s worst away from home against any team it has played at least three times.
For Pakistan, much of the focus heading into the series has been on Younis Khan who needs 19 runs to surpass Javed Miandad as the country’s all-time highest Test run scorer.
Follow the action in our live blog below or stay up to date in our match centre.
 Live: Pakistan steady after rocky start
